metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7542 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xen 4.8.x through 4.10.x allowing x86 PVH guestOS users to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference andhypervisor crash) by leveraging the mishandling of configurations that lacka Local APIC.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7542` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.9 - 4.8.3+comet2+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u5
libxenstore3.0 - 4.8.3+comet2+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u5
